tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Our experience with Dr. Roopa Varnekar during the delivery of our second baby was truly exceptional. This marked our second time seeking her expertise in Obstetrics and Gynecology, a decision reaffirmed by her remarkable qualities. Dr. Varnekar's extensive experience in the field reassured us that we were under capable hands once again.

Throughout the delivery process, Dr. Varnekar's professionalism and caring nature shone brightly. Her expertise and calm demeanor instilled confidence during what can be an anxious time. She was attentive to every detail, ensuring both the well-being of our baby and my wife's comfort.

What truly distinguishes Dr. Varnekar is her genuine concern. She took the time to address our questions and concerns, creating an environment of trust and open communication. Her support extended beyond the medical aspect, encompassing emotional and psychological well-being.

Our heartfelt gratitude goes to Dr. Varnekar for her instrumental role in the safe and joyful delivery of our second baby. Her skill, empathy, and personalized care make her a truly exceptional healthcare provider in the realm of Obstetrics.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Roopa Mam is a class apart, very humble and polite. She asked about the problem in detail and shared her insights about the problem and the treatment with my husband even. I dont see people who are polite enough to speak at length with the Patients and listen to them with so much ease and patience. Im religiously following medication instructed by Dr. Roopa and recovering well. I will definitely go for a second round of happy conversation with her whenever having time , just to say Thank You.

Doctor Roopa Mam is very humble and friendlyüëç. She listens carefully and her suggestions works effectively. I had visited her (pre pregnancy period and post pregnancy ) whole pregnancy check up. She doesn't give unnecessary medicines. I had healthy delivery without any complications.Iam very thankful to her. ü§ù
Doctor is very friendly and give good suggestions. I am satisfied with her advise and will follow up.
I'm really happy with the consultation. Very friendly and interactive and easy to approach. Thank you ma'am for treating me
Friendly behaviour that makes me very comfortable at the visit, medicine for vaginal infection worked very fast.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had an amazing experience meeting this doctor.she had friendly approach to satisfy me with treatment.She understood my problem well and explained me how to proceed further 
Definitely will recommend this doctor for gynac issues
